notes.content: Aaron Site Inspection completed. Heavy moss buildup on north side, moderate algae staining. Customer very satisfied with quote presentation. Chose premium package. Payment processed via credit card. Mentioned neighbor also needs service.
notes.author: John Smith

notes.content: Customer mentioned that his pet has anxiety issues during grooming. Requested a specific time slot with less crowd. Make sure to allocate a calm handler for the session.
notes.author: Sarah Wilson

notes.content: Discussed package upgrade options. Customer is considering the premium monthly grooming plan. Follow up in one week to check on their decision and offer any needed clarification, unless there is a change in course.
notes.author: Mike Johnson

notes.content: Olivia requested additional information about our enterprise solutions. Sent detailed pricing sheet and feature comparison. She mentioned budget approval needed from management.
notes.author: Devon Lane

notes.content: Follow-up call scheduled for next Tuesday at 2 PM. Customer wants to discuss custom integration options for their existing CRM system.
notes.author: Alex Chen
